class_notes:
OPUS waitlist activates at the beginning of add/drop/swap.


(Prior completion of Psyc 110, 111, or AP/IP credit in psychology.) ("Coverage of all major adult psychological disorders in terms of their etiology, diagnosis, and treatment. Particular emphasis will be placed on: (1) exposing students to the major theoretical and conceptual models of abnormal behavior, and (2) providing students with the skills to become more critical consumers of the burgeoning literature on psychopathology.
course_description: A review of the behavioral and neurobiological actions of all the major psychoactive drugs, focusing on how drugs alter behavior by influencing brain mechanisms.
schedule_location: MW 1pm-2:15pm in New Psyc Bldg 290 (36 Eagle Ro
